ygData.subject: Re: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: You guys are just calling it lazy but are missing the overall picture. It takes time to make a change and often one bit of code is entwined with another so
ygData.messageBody:
You guys are just calling it lazy but are missing the overall picture.
It takes time to make a change and often one bit of code is entwined with
another so then you should debug and test it. Also depending on how they
coded it this could be a very major change to make. If they left it in
then in the meantime they are granting an exploit. The big picture is
this. Who do they take care of first> The enchanters by leaving it as is
until they can fix it or the rest of the player base by taking it out now?
The majority rules so taking it out is the best move for the greatest
good. Don't call it lazy programming to get these spells off the PVP
process, call it a regrettable need to serve the greatest good. Oh and
don't go calling this just an enchanter nerf either. That also shows
narrow focus instead of a view of the whole picture, were not the only
ones with these spells.
And to say losing them reduces us to just poor nukers is really so much
Hyperbolae. I doubt anyone on this list believes that.

I applaud and accept the change.
Now if they don't fix it you can call that lazy programming if you want
but remember that working on this would cut back on programming resources
elsewhere. Our enchantments for example.....
Programming resources are finite and have to be rationed somewhere. I
don't hear any qualified programmer's volunteering to pitch in for free on
this list. Until you do watch the rock throwing.




Ric R <redr@...>
11/17/99 08:35 AM
Please respond to eqenchanters


To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Latest nerf

From: Ric R <redr@...>

Yup, Dispell only works on another player if they are grouped with you
now.
Again a lazy change for this is great on all levels cept +PvP server where
someone wants to fight. Heck our lvl 50 Cleric took on 2 lvl 50 necros,
killed one and sent the other running with bub of health left thanks to
this change. LOL again, way to be the lazy dog Veriant.

Telan
